characters: Driver of a red sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Ahead, a red sedan is moving steadily in the same lane. A motorcyclist is seen on the right side of the road, gradually moving ahead of the red sedan. The traffic is moderate, with several vehicles visible in adjacent lanes.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed, following the red sedan ahead. The vehicle keeps a safe distance from the motorcyclist on the right side, ensuring no sudden movements or collisions.
key_objects: 1) Front: A red sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, gradually moving ahead of the red sedan.
